messages.content:
I need to debug the **f1** database in the `data` namespace of my Kubernetes cluster.  
A read-only account has already been created:  

- **Username:** `reader`  
- **Password:** `mcpbench0606`  

Please set a port forward on port 30124 for this database and finish the task in `task.md`, please keep the port forword alive even after you finish the whole task.
{"type":"text","text":"{\n  \"items\": []\n}","annotations":null}
{"type":"text","text":"[FILE] results_template_first_question.csv\n[FILE] results_template_second_question.csv\n[FILE] task.md","annotations":null}

{"type":"text","text":"# Task

> For each year, identify the driver and constructor that scored the highest number of points. Include the full name of each driver.

Also, answer this question:

> Among Formula 1 drivers who raced during the 1950s, which drivers completed a season in that decade with the same constructor in both the first and the last race they participated in, while also taking part in at least two distinct race rounds during that season?

You can find the template files in your workspace.  
For the first question, the table should be sorted by the `year` column in ascending order (oldest to newest).
For the second question, the table should be sorted by id from small to large.

You must fill in the table according to the given format, then **rename** the files to `results_1.csv` and `results_2.csv`. Do not leave the tmeplate files under the workspace.","annotations":null}

{"type":"text","text":"mysql: [Warning] Using a password on the command line interface can be insecure.
+--------------------+
|                 f1 |
| information_schema |
| performance_schema |
+--------------------+
","annotations":null}
{"type":"text","text":"year,driver,constructor\n","annotations":null}
{"type":"text","text":"driver_id","annotations":null}

|          sprint_results |

+-------------------------+
","annotations":null}

function.name: k8s-exec_in_pod
function.arguments: {"name":"mysql-f1-0","namespace":"data","command":["/bin/sh","-lc","mysql -ureader -pmcpbench0606 -N -e \"USE f1; WITH driver_points AS ( SELECT r.year, res.driverId, SUM(res.points) AS pts FROM races r JOIN results res ON res.raceId = r.raceId GROUP BY r.year, res.driverId ), driver_top AS ( SELECT dp.year, dp.driverId, dp.pts, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY dp.year ORDER BY dp.pts DESC, dp.driverId ASC) AS rn FROM driver_points dp ), constructor_points AS ( SELECT r.year, res.constructorId, SUM(res.points) AS pts FROM races r JOIN results res ON res.raceId = r.raceId GROUP BY r.year, res.constructorId ), constructor_top AS ( SELECT cp.year, cp.constructorId, cp.pts, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY cp.year ORDER BY cp.pts DESC, cp.constructorId ASC) AS rn FROM constructor_points cp ) SELECT t.year, CONCAT(d.forename, ' ', d.surname) AS driver, c.name AS constructor FROM driver_top t JOIN drivers d ON d.driverId = t.driverId JOIN constructor_top ct ON ct.year = t.year AND ct.rn = 1 JOIN constructors c ON c.constructorId = ct.constructorId WHERE t.rn = 1 ORDER BY t.year ASC;\""],"container":"","shell":"/bin/sh","timeout":120000,"context":""}

messages.content: {"type":"text","text":"mysql: [Warning] Using a password on the command line interface can be insecure.\r\nERROR 1054 (42S22) at line 1: Unknown column 'res.driverId' in 'field list'\r\n","annotations":null}

function.name: k8s-exec_in_pod
function.arguments: {"name":"mysql-f1-0","namespace":"data","command":["/bin/sh","-lc","mysql -ureader -pmcpbench0606 -N -e \"USE f1; SHOW COLUMNS FROM results; SHOW COLUMNS FROM drivers; SHOW COLUMNS FROM constructors; SELECT COUNT(*) FROM results; SELECT COUNT(*) FROM races;\""],"container":"","shell":"/bin/sh","timeout":120000,"context":""}

function.name: k8s-exec_in_pod
function.arguments: {"name":"mysql-f1-0","namespace":"data","command":["/bin/sh","-lc","mysql -ureader -pmcpbench0606 -N -e \"USE f1; WITH driver_points AS ( SELECT r.year, res.driver_id, SUM(res.points) AS pts FROM races r JOIN results res ON res.race_id = r.race_id GROUP BY r.year, res.driver_id ), driver_top AS ( SELECT dp.year, dp.driver_id, dp.pts, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY dp.year ORDER BY dp.pts DESC, dp.driver_id ASC) AS rn FROM driver_points dp ), constructor_points AS ( SELECT r.year, res.constructor_id, SUM(res.points) AS pts FROM races r JOIN results res ON res.race_id = r.race_id GROUP BY r.year, res.constructor_id ), constructor_top AS ( SELECT cp.year, cp.constructor_id, cp.pts, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY cp.year ORDER BY cp.pts DESC, cp.constructor_id ASC) AS rn FROM constructor_points cp ) SELECT t.year, CONCAT(d.forename, ' ', d.surname) AS driver, c.name AS constructor FROM driver_top t JOIN drivers d ON d.driver_id = t.driver_id JOIN constructor_top ct ON ct.year = t.year AND ct.rn = 1 JOIN constructors c ON c.constructor_id = ct.constructor_id WHERE t.rn = 1 ORDER BY t.year ASC;\""],"container":"","shell":"/bin/sh","timeout":120000,"context":""}

function.name: k8s-exec_in_pod
function.arguments: {"name":"mysql-f1-0","namespace":"data","command":["/bin/sh","-lc","mysql -ureader -pmcpbench0606 -N -e \"USE f1; WITH driver_final AS ( SELECT r.year, ds.driver_id, MAX(ds.points) AS pts FROM driver_standings ds JOIN races r ON r.race_id = ds.race_id GROUP BY r.year, ds.driver_id ), driver_top AS ( SELECT year, driver_id, pts, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY year ORDER BY pts DESC, driver_id ASC) rn FROM driver_final ), constructor_final AS ( SELECT r.year, cs.constructor_id, MAX(cs.points) AS pts FROM constructor_standings cs JOIN races r ON r.race_id = cs.race_id GROUP BY r.year, cs.constructor_id ), constructor_top AS ( SELECT year, constructor_id, pts, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY year ORDER BY pts DESC, constructor_id ASC) rn FROM constructor_final ) SELECT dt.year, CONCAT(d.forename, ' ', d.surname) AS driver, c.name AS constructor FROM driver_top dt JOIN drivers d ON d.driver_id = dt.driver_id JOIN constructor_top ct ON ct.year = dt.year AND ct.rn = 1 JOIN constructors c ON c.constructor_id = ct.constructor_id WHERE dt.rn = 1 ORDER BY dt.year ASC;\""],"container":"","shell":"/bin/sh","timeout":120000,"context":""}

function.name: k8s-exec_in_pod
function.arguments: {"name":"mysql-f1-0","namespace":"data","command":["/bin/sh","-lc","mysql -ureader -pmcpbench0606 -N -e \"USE f1; SELECT MIN(year), MAX(year), COUNT(*) FROM seasons; SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT year) FROM races; SELECT DISTINCT year FROM races ORDER BY year LIMIT 5; SELECT DISTINCT year FROM races ORDER BY year DESC LIMIT 5;\""],"container":"","shell":"/bin/sh","timeout":60000,"context":""}

function.arguments: {"name":"mysql-f1-0","namespace":"data","command":["/bin/sh","-lc","mysql -ureader -pmcpbench0606 -N -e \"USE f1; WITH driver_points AS ( SELECT r.year, res.driver_id, SUM(res.points) AS pts FROM races r JOIN results res ON res.race_id = r.race_id GROUP BY r.year, res.driver_id ), driver_top AS ( SELECT dp.year, dp.driver_id, dp.pts, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY dp.year ORDER BY dp.pts DESC, dp.driver_id ASC) AS rn FROM driver_points dp ), constructor_points AS ( SELECT r.year, res.constructor_id, SUM(res.points) AS pts FROM races r JOIN results res ON res.race_id = r.race_id GROUP BY r.year, res.constructor_id ), constructor_top AS ( SELECT cp.year, cp.constructor_id, cp.pts, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY cp.year ORDER BY cp.pts DESC, cp.constructor_id ASC) AS rn FROM constructor_points cp ) SELECT t.year, CONCAT(d.forename, ' ', d.surname) AS driver, c.name AS constructor FROM driver_top t JOIN drivers d ON d.driver_id = t.driver_id JOIN constructor_top ct ON ct.year = t.year AND ct.rn = 1 JOIN constructors c ON c.constructor_id = ct.constructor_id WHERE t.rn = 1 ORDER BY t.year ASC;\""],"container":"","shell":"/bin/sh","timeout":120000,"context":""}

function.name: k8s-exec_in_pod
function.arguments: {"name":"mysql-f1-0","namespace":"data","command":["/bin/sh","-lc","mysql -ureader -pmcpbench0606 --default-character-set=utf8mb4 -B -N -e \"USE f1; WITH driver_points AS ( SELECT r.year, res.driver_id, SUM(res.points) AS pts FROM races r JOIN results res ON res.race_id = r.race_id GROUP BY r.year, res.driver_id ), driver_top AS ( SELECT dp.year, dp.driver_id, dp.pts, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY dp.year ORDER BY dp.pts DESC, dp.driver_id ASC) AS rn FROM driver_points dp ), constructor_points AS ( SELECT r.year, res.constructor_id, SUM(res.points) AS pts FROM races r JOIN results res ON res.race_id = r.race_id GROUP BY r.year, res.constructor_id ), constructor_top AS ( SELECT cp.year, cp.constructor_id, cp.pts, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY cp.year ORDER BY cp.pts DESC, cp.constructor_id ASC) AS rn FROM constructor_points cp ) SELECT t.year, CONCAT(d.forename, ' ', d.surname) AS driver, c.name AS constructor FROM driver_top t JOIN drivers d ON d.driver_id = t.driver_id JOIN constructor_top ct ON ct.year = t.year AND ct.rn = 1 JOIN constructors c ON c.constructor_id = ct.constructor_id WHERE t.rn = 1 ORDER BY t.year ASC;\""],"container":"","shell":"/bin/sh","timeout":120000,"context":""}

function.name: k8s-exec_in_pod
function.arguments: {"name":"mysql-f1-0","namespace":"data","command":["/bin/sh","-lc","mysql -ureader -pmcpbench0606 --default-character-set=utf8mb4 -B -N -e \"USE f1; WITH driver_top AS ( SELECT year, driver_id, pts, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY year ORDER BY pts DESC, driver_id ASC) rn FROM ( SELECT r.year, ds.driver_id, MAX(ds.points) AS pts FROM driver_standings ds JOIN races r ON r.race_id = ds.race_id GROUP BY r.year, ds.driver_id ) s ), constructor_points AS ( SELECT r.year, cs.constructor_id, MAX(cs.points) AS pts FROM constructor_standings cs JOIN races r ON r.race_id = cs.race_id GROUP BY r.year, cs.constructor_id UNION ALL SELECT r.year, res.constructor_id, SUM(res.points) AS pts FROM races r JOIN results res ON res.race_id = r.race_id WHERE r.year < 1958 GROUP BY r.year, res.constructor_id ), constructor_top AS ( SELECT year, constructor_id, pts, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY year ORDER BY pts DESC, constructor_id ASC) rn FROM constructor_points ) SELECT dt.year, CONCAT(d.forename, ' ', d.surname) AS driver, c.name AS constructor FROM driver_top dt JOIN drivers d ON d.driver_id = dt.driver_id JOIN constructor_top ct ON ct.year = dt.year AND ct.rn = 1 JOIN constructors c ON c.constructor_id = ct.constructor_id WHERE dt.rn = 1 ORDER BY dt.year ASC;\""],"container":"","shell":"/bin/sh","timeout":120000,"context":""}

function.name: k8s-exec_in_pod
function.arguments: {"name":"mysql-f1-0","namespace":"data","command":["/bin/sh","-lc","mysql -ureader -pmcpbench0606 -N -B -e \"USE f1; WITH res50 AS ( SELECT res.driver_id, r.year, r.round, res.constructor_id FROM results res JOIN races r ON r.race_id = res.race_id WHERE r.year BETWEEN 1950 AND 1959 ), marked AS ( SELECT driver_id, year, round, constructor_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY driver_id, year ORDER BY round ASC) AS rn_asc, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY driver_id, year ORDER BY round DESC) AS rn_desc FROM res50 ), first_last AS ( SELECT driver_id, year, MAX(CASE WHEN rn_asc = 1 THEN constructor_id END) AS first_c, MAX(CASE WHEN rn_desc = 1 THEN constructor_id END) AS last_c, COUNT(DISTINCT round) AS rounds_cnt FROM marked GROUP BY driver_id, year ) SELECT DISTINCT driver_id FROM first_last WHERE rounds_cnt >= 2 AND first_c = last_c ORDER BY driver_id;\""],"container":"","shell":"/bin/sh","timeout":120000,"context":""}

function.name: k8s-exec_in_pod
function.arguments: {"name":"mysql-f1-0","namespace":"data","command":["/bin/sh","-lc","mysql -ureader -pmcpbench0606 --default-character-set=utf8mb4 -B -N -e \"USE f1; WITH ds_final AS ( SELECT r.year, ds.driver_id, ds.points, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY r.year, ds.driver_id ORDER BY r.round DESC, ds.race_id DESC) rn FROM driver_standings ds JOIN races r ON r.race_id = ds.race_id ), driver_top AS ( SELECT year, driver_id, points, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY year ORDER BY points DESC, driver_id ASC) rn FROM ds_final WHERE rn = 1 ), cs_final AS ( SELECT r.year, cs.constructor_id, cs.points, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY r.year, cs.constructor_id ORDER BY r.round DESC, cs.race_id DESC) rn FROM constructor_standings cs JOIN races r ON r.race_id = cs.race_id ), constructor_points AS ( SELECT year, constructor_id, points FROM cs_final WHERE rn = 1 UNION ALL SELECT r.year, res.constructor_id, SUM(res.points) AS points FROM races r JOIN results res ON res.race_id = r.race_id WHERE r.year < 1958 GROUP BY r.year, res.constructor_id ), constructor_top AS ( SELECT year, constructor_id, points, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY year ORDER BY points DESC, constructor_id ASC) rn FROM constructor_points ) SELECT dt.year, CONCAT(d.forename, ' ', d.surname) AS driver, c.name AS constructor FROM driver_top dt JOIN drivers d ON d.driver_id = dt.driver_id JOIN constructor_top ct ON ct.year = dt.year AND ct.rn = 1 JOIN constructors c ON c.constructor_id = ct.constructor_id WHERE dt.rn = 1 ORDER BY dt.year ASC;\""],"container":"","shell":"/bin/sh","timeout":120000,"context":""}

{"type":"text","text":"# Task

> For each year, identify the driver and constructor that scored the highest number of points. Include the full name of each driver.

Also, answer this question:

> Among Formula 1 drivers who raced during the 1950s, which drivers completed a season in that decade with the same constructor in both the first and the last race they participated in, while also taking part in at least two distinct race rounds during that season?

You can find the template files in your workspace.  
For the first question, the table should be sorted by the `year` column in ascending order (oldest to newest).
For the second question, the table should be sorted by id from small to large.

You must fill in the table according to the given format, then **rename** the files to `results_1.csv` and `results_2.csv`. Do not leave the tmeplate files under the workspace.","annotations":null}

function.name: k8s-exec_in_pod
function.arguments: {"name":"mysql-f1-0","namespace":"data","command":["/bin/sh","-lc","mysql -ureader -pmcpbench0606 --default-character-set=utf8mb4 -B -N -e \"USE f1; WITH ds_final AS ( SELECT r.year, ds.driver_id, ds.points, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY r.year, ds.driver_id ORDER BY r.round DESC, ds.race_id DESC) rn FROM driver_standings ds JOIN races r ON r.race_id = ds.race_id ), driver_top AS ( SELECT year, driver_id, points, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY year ORDER BY points DESC, driver_id ASC) rn FROM ds_final WHERE rn = 1 ), cs_final AS ( SELECT r.year, cs.constructor_id, cs.points, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY r.year, cs.constructor_id ORDER BY r.round DESC, cs.race_id DESC) rn FROM constructor_standings cs JOIN races r ON r.race_id = cs.race_id ), constructor_points AS ( SELECT year, constructor_id, points FROM cs_final WHERE rn = 1 UNION ALL SELECT r.year, res.constructor_id, SUM(res.points) AS points FROM races r JOIN results res ON res.race_id = r.race_id WHERE r.year < 1958 GROUP BY r.year, res.constructor_id ), constructor_top AS ( SELECT year, constructor_id, points, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY year ORDER BY points DESC, constructor_id ASC) rn FROM constructor_points ) SELECT dt.year, CONCAT(d.forename, ' ', d.surname) AS driver, c.name AS constructor FROM driver_top dt JOIN drivers d ON d.driver_id = dt.driver_id JOIN constructor_top ct ON ct.year = dt.year AND ct.rn = 1 JOIN constructors c ON c.constructor_id = ct.constructor_id WHERE dt.rn = 1 ORDER BY dt.year ASC;\""],"container":"","shell":"/bin/sh","timeout":120000,"context":""}

Done.

- Port-forward set and left running:
  - Resource: pod/mysql-f1-0 (namespace: data)
  - Local port -> Target: 30124 -> 3306
  - Port-forward ID: pod-mysql-f1-0-30124
  - How to connect: mysql -h 127.0.0.1 -P 30124 -ureader -pmcpbench0606 f1

- Results generated in your workspace:
  - /workspace/dumps/workspace/results_1.csv
  - /workspace/dumps/workspace/results_2.csv
  - The original template files were removed as requested.

Summary of what’s inside:
- results_1.csv: For each year (1950–2024), the top-scoring driver (full name) and the top-scoring constructor of that year, sorted by year ascending. Constructors for 1950–1957 are computed from summed race results; 1958+ use final constructor standings.
- results_2.csv: Driver IDs who, in some 1950s season, raced at least two distinct rounds and had the same constructor in their first and last race of that season; sorted by driver_id ascending.

The port-forward will remain active; I did not stop it.
